name: Madden NFL 2002 [GBA]
description:
Madden NFL 2002 is a sports game developed by Electronic Arts Tiburon and Budcat Creations. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by Electronic Arts. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Madden NFL 2002 on Xbox, PlayStation 2, Game Boy Color and Nintendo 64.
